name: Yellow Haze
description:
Welcome to Borneoland, a prosperous and peaceful village of utankind. One day, a stranger came and brought the "Yellow Haze", a gift of joy and hapiness. But the gift doesn't come free. Years of prosperity and peace is threaten.

When everyone is against you, what will you do? When you almost have nothing but threat and oppression, will you stay true to yourself?

Yellow Haze is a branching, story-driven game about reacting to a destructive change to your surrounding. Your decision matters in this game as you find out more about the Yellow Haze and the residence of Borneoland. Find your way to respond the gift of Yellow Haze.

Will you stay true until the end or will you live longer to see yourself change to what you're not?
